title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 $300 off, second-best Galaxy Tab S8+ price, more
content:
All of this weekend’s best deals kick off with a notable Galaxy foldable discount by way of Samsung’s Z Fold 3 at $300 off. That’s alongside the second-best price on Samsung’s new Galaxy Tab S8+ and Anker’s PowerExtend strip for $15. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: A notable Samsung Galaxy foldable discount has gone live at Amazon, taking $300 off the Z Fold 3.
